LocaleSwitch.switch: เปลี่ยนเป็นภาษาไทย

Homepage.text1: 'Miles for Heart' Virtual Walk and Run is now open for registration
Homepage.text2: Come walk or run for health with us today
Homepage.text3: Facebook : ANAN DAY Instagram: @anan_day or on this website
Homepage.stepsTitle: Steps to Receive a Commemorative Pin or T-Shirt – Ananda Mahidol Charity
Homepage.steps1_1: Specify the amount you wish to donate
Homepage.steps1_2: Indicate the number of t-shirts, pins, or both that you wish to receive based on your donation amount
Homepage.steps1_2_1: For every 150 THB donation, you can receive one commemorative pin
Homepage.steps1_2_2: For every 299 THB donation, you can receive one commemorative t-shirt
Homepage.steps1_3: Note: Free shipping, no additional charges
Homepage.stepsNote: The Faculty of Medicine, Chulalongkorn University, will process and summarize orders on the 1st of every month at 12:00. Pins and t-shirts will be shipped within 3 weeks after the order summary. The estimated timeline is subject to possible delays due to production.

Footer.message: Faculty of Medicine, Chulalongkron University Tel. 02 256 4183 or 02 256 4462

RegistrationForm.title: Registration
RegistrationForm.subtitle: Anandamahidol Day charity campaign of Faculty of Medicine, Chulalongkorn University 2024
RegistrationForm.requestReceiptLabel: Would you prefer to receive a receipt?
RegistrationForm.requestReceiptCheckbox: Would you prefer to receive a receipt?
RegistrationForm.requestReceiptNote: (Only applicable for donations via bank account number, and the process takes 1 month according to working hours)
RegistrationForm.nameOnReceiptLabel: Preferred name to be included on the receipt
RegistrationForm.addressOnReceiptLabel: Billing address (If this is the same as the shipping address, kindly leave this field blank)
RegistrationForm.addressOnReceiptExample: (Leave this field empty to use the Delivery Address)
RegistrationForm.itemOrderRemaining: You {amount, plural, =0 {cannot order more {name}} =1 {can order one more {name}} other {can order # more {name}s}}.
RegistrationForm.priceExceedDonationAmount: Total price of {totalPrice} exceeded donation amount of {donationAmount}! Please remove some item or increase donation amount.
RegistrationForm.paymentTransferUploadNote: Upload upto 5 images, max 5 MiB each.
RegistrationForm.paymentTransferUploadMissing: Upload at least 1 image to prove your transaction.
RegistrationForm.submittingMsg: Please wait while we're processing your information.
RegistrationForm.submitFailedMsg: Failed to process your information, please try again.
RegistrationForm.submitSuccessNote: Please keep note of this tracking code. Thank you.

ImageUpload.add: Click or drag-and-drop here to upload image
ImageUpload.fileTooMany: Uploaded too many images! You can upload only 5 images.

TrackingPage.title: Track Status
TrackingPage.note: Please enter the tracking code you received from registration.
TrackingPage.trackingListRemoveConfirm: Confirm removing tracking code {code} from list?
TrackingPage.recoveryInstruction: Enter your name and phone number to search for your tracking code.
TrackingPage.recoveryFound: Found {amount, plural, =0 {no result} =1 {1 result} other {# results}}.
